title: Sanzer Rebbe in Yerushalayim
body: The Sanzer Rebbe will spend Shabbos in Yerushalayim's Old City with 120 prominent philanthropists from the US, Europe, and Israel, marking the first time in Sanzer chassidus history.

title: Satmar Rebbe Slams Elaborate Chupahs
body: Satmar Rebbe Rav Aharon Teitelbaum condemns extravagant chupahs, calling for a return to traditional kedushah, saying "as the shaitel grows longer, so does the orchestra".

title: Alexander Beis Medrash Demolished
body: Alexander Chassidus' Beis Medrash in Bnei Brak demolished after 55 years, making way for a new grand Beis Medrash to accommodate the growing community of Alexander chassidim.
